name: Italian Air Force Boeing KC-767 Tanker Landing at Calgary Airport
description:
YYC has turned into an Air Force Base again! Every summer, NATO troops come to Calgary to train at Suffield, a Canadian Forces Base southeast of Calgary. We've received some unique visitors already from the French, Belgian, and German Air Forces, but this Italian 767 is a new sight for us in Calgary! Enjoy this KC-767, a modified Boeing 767-200ER that can be used as a transport aircraft as well as an air-to-air tanker! ATC is included. 

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Italian Air Force/Aeronautica Militare (IAM)
Aircraft: Boeing 767-2EY(ER)/KC-767A (B762)
Flight Number: IAM1431
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Standard Grey
Engines: 2x GE CF6-80C2B7F 
Registration: MM62229 - 14-04
Route: Unknown - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: ITALIAN AIR FORCE 1431 heavy
Runway used: 17R
Date filmed: July 5, 2018
Local time: 1830
